title: build trilinos with gcc7.0
body:
```
ermore@ermore:~$ spack install trilinos
==> diffutils is already installed in /home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/diffutils-3.6-cj7oc5hii5l5karvq4t5adcde2wueh6u
==> bzip2 is already installed in /home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/bzip2-1.0.6-4orv5thyrbaev7odgm5g6r3ungzj5yxv
==> zlib is already installed in /home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-av3mmgf66zwic2i34n7o2oxtp4quy6pi
==> Installing boost
==> Searching for binary cache of boost
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for boost found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/var/spack/cache/boost/boost-1.69.0.tar.bz2
==> Staging archive: /home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/var/spack/stage/boost-1.69.0-tumf2uczfthw45zseuvqymll2luapm6d/boost_1_69_0.tar.bz2
==> Created stage in /home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/var/spack/stage/boost-1.69.0-tumf2uczfthw45zseuvqymll2luapm6d
==> Error: TypeError: expected str, bytes or os.PathLike object, not NoneType

/home/ermore/Documents/software/source/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:991, in do_patch:
        988
        989        # Construct paths to special files in the archive dir used to
        990        # keep track of whether patches were successfully applied.
  >>    991        archive_dir = self.stage.source_path
        992        good_file = os.path.join(archive_dir, '.spack_patched')
        993        no_patches_file = os.path.join(archive_dir, '.spack_no_patches')
        994        bad_file = os.path.join(archive_dir, '.spack_patch_failed')
```

```
ermore@ermore:~$ uname -a
Linux ermore 4.15.0-42-generic #45-Ubuntu SMP Thu Nov 15 19:32:57 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux nuvolari 4.15.0-29-generic #31-Ubuntu SMP Tue Jul 17 15:39:52 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
ermore@ermore:~$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS
```
